metadata.title: CVE-2023-41983 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling. This issue is fixedin macOS Sonoma 14.1, Safari 17.1, iOS 16.7.2 and iPadOS 16.7.2, iOS 17.1and iPadOS 17.1. Processing web content may lead to a denial-of-service.

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
wpewebkit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
